title: (x) Designing Books: Practice and Theory - Univers, Baskerville MT {Paul Stanley}
content:

which font is this? thank you
author: piticu

comments.content:
Cheating, because I have the book.   
   
The sans is Univers, black (75) I think.   
   
The serif is, I think, MT Baskerville.
